languages.text: "Сотворение юнификата — опасное знание, осуждаемое многими как акт творения без благословения Омниссии. В его основе не лежит прямой образец, измысленный предтечами, лишь косвенно связанные технологии".

"Creation of unificates is dangerous knowledge that has long since been denounced by many as a procedure not blessed by the Omnissiah. It is based not on a direct prototype envisioned by the precursors, merely on loosely connected technologies."
languages.original_text: "Сотворение юнификата — опасное знание, осуждаемое многими как акт творения без благословения Омниссии. В его основе не лежит прямой образец, измысленный предтечами, лишь косвенно связанные технологии".

traits.locale_text: "Creation of unificates is dangerous knowledge that has long since been denounced by many as a procedure not blessed by the Omnissiah. It is based not on a direct prototype envisioned by the precursors, merely on loosely connected technologies."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “创造统一体的知识非常危险，很久以前就被驳斥为不受欧姆尼塞亚庇佑的异端知识。这些知识并非建立在先驱者设想的原型之上，而是建立在联系松散的诸多技术之上。”
languages.original_text: "Creation of unificates is dangerous knowledge that has long since been denounced by many as a procedure not blessed by the Omnissiah. It is based not on a direct prototype envisioned by the precursors, merely on loosely connected technologies."

traits.locale_text: “创造统一体的知识非常危险，很久以前就被驳斥为不受欧姆尼塞亚庇佑的异端知识。这些知识并非建立在先驱者设想的原型之上，而是建立在联系松散的诸多技术之上。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « La création d'unifiés est un savoir dangereux, depuis longtemps dénoncé à hauts cris comme étant une procédure non sanctifiée par l'Omnimessie. Elle se base non pas sur un prototype direct imaginé par les précurseurs, mais sur des technologies vaguement connectées. »
languages.original_text: "Creation of unificates is dangerous knowledge that has long since been denounced by many as a procedure not blessed by the Omnissiah. It is based not on a direct prototype envisioned by the precursors, merely on loosely connected technologies."

traits.locale_text: « La création d'unifiés est un savoir dangereux, depuis longtemps dénoncé à hauts cris comme étant une procédure non sanctifiée par l'Omnimessie. Elle se base non pas sur un prototype direct imaginé par les précurseurs, mais sur des technologies vaguement connectées. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「一体型ユニットの作成は危険な知識であり、長い間、万機神の祝福を受けていない手順として多くの人々によって非難されてきた。それは前駆者たちが思い描いた直接的な原型に基づくものではなく、緩やかに結びついた技術に基づくものだった」
languages.original_text: "Creation of unificates is dangerous knowledge that has long since been denounced by many as a procedure not blessed by the Omnissiah. It is based not on a direct prototype envisioned by the precursors, merely on loosely connected technologies."

traits.locale_text: 「一体型ユニットの作成は危険な知識であり、長い間、万機神の祝福を受けていない手順として多くの人々によって非難されてきた。それは前駆者たちが思い描いた直接的な原型に基づくものではなく、緩やかに結びついた技術に基づくものだった」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «La creación de unificados es un saber peligroso que se ha considerado desde siempre como un procedimiento opuesto al dogma del Omnissiah. No se basa en un prototipo provisto por los precursores, sino simplemente en tecnologías que apenas guardan conexión».
languages.original_text: "Creation of unificates is dangerous knowledge that has long since been denounced by many as a procedure not blessed by the Omnissiah. It is based not on a direct prototype envisioned by the precursors, merely on loosely connected technologies."

traits.locale_text: «La creación de unificados es un saber peligroso que se ha considerado desde siempre como un procedimiento opuesto al dogma del Omnissiah. No se basa en un prototipo provisto por los precursores, sino simplemente en tecnologías que apenas guardan conexión».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Wie man Unifikate erschafft, ist gefährliches Wissen. Viele sind sich seit langem einig, dass der Omnissiah diese Prozedur nicht gesegnet hat. Sie basiert nicht auf einem direkten Prototypen, der von den Vorläufern ersonnen wurde, sondern lediglich auf lose verbundenen Technologien."
languages.original_text: "Creation of unificates is dangerous knowledge that has long since been denounced by many as a procedure not blessed by the Omnissiah. It is based not on a direct prototype envisioned by the precursors, merely on loosely connected technologies."

traits.locale_text: "Wie man Unifikate erschafft, ist gefährliches Wissen. Viele sind sich seit langem einig, dass der Omnissiah diese Prozedur nicht gesegnet hat. Sie basiert nicht auf einem direkten Prototypen, der von den Vorläufern ersonnen wurde, sondern lediglich auf lose verbundenen Technologien."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Yekvücutların yaratımı, Hermesih'in onaylamadığı bir prosedür olduğu için pek çokları tarafından kınanan, tehlikeli bir irfandır. Doğrudan öncülerin tasarladığı prototiplere değil, birbiriyle uzaktan ilintili teknolojilere dayanmaktadır."
languages.original_text: "Creation of unificates is dangerous knowledge that has long since been denounced by many as a procedure not blessed by the Omnissiah. It is based not on a direct prototype envisioned by the precursors, merely on loosely connected technologies."
